meta.title: KAIPER — Cooling Solutions for Extreme Heat

problem.title: Why Cooling?
problem.subtitle: Extreme heat is no longer a seasonal event. As the planet gets hotter every year, outdoor workers are the first to suffer.

crisis.title: Climate Crisis
crisis.description: Heat wave days have doubled in the past decade. Urban heat islands combined with climate change are rapidly deteriorating outdoor working conditions.

vulnerability.title: Human Vulnerability
vulnerability.description: Human thermoregulation has limits. Above 38°C, concentration drops by 50% and heatstroke risk increases exponentially.

gap.title: Solution Gap
gap.description: Existing cooling products fail to deliver performance, convenience, and portability together. Field workers deserve a real solution.
